```{r}
library("csv")
asana <- read.csv("asana.csv")

# Select a few
selection <- 12
total <- nrow(asana)
print(paste("A selection of", selection, "from", total, "asana"))

# Take sample of all asana
s <- sample(total, selection)
asana[s,]
```
